items.sentence: My wife works as a nurse at a local hospital.

It\'s not easy for Tom to get off work early.
It\'s not like I really want to go to Boston.
It\'s not like we have anything better to do.
Tom should\'ve discussed it with his parents.
If you don\'t hurry, you\'ll miss your train.
Tom didn\'t understand a word that Mary said.
Tom didn\'t want me to go shopping with Mary.
